request_cancelled: Request to API server was cancelled
internet_connection_error: Connection to API server failed due to internet connection
unknown_error: Connection to API server failed due to Unknown Error
bad_certificates_error: Connection to API server failed due to Bad Certificate
apiKeyDisabledMessage: Your API key has been disabled
apiKeyExhaustedMessage: Your API key has no more requests available
apiKeyInvalidMessage: Your API key hasn't been entered correctly. Double check it and try again.
apiKeyMissingMessage: Your API key is missing from the request. Append it to the request with one of these methods.
parameterInvalidMessage: You've included a parameter in your request which is currently not supported
parameterMissingMessage: Required parameters are missing from the request and it cannot be completed
rateLimitedMessage: You have been rate limited. Back off for a while before trying the request again
sourcesTooManyMessage: You have requested too many sources in a single request. Try splitting the request into 2 smaller requests
sourceDoesNotExistMessage: You have requested a source which does not exist
unexpectedErrorMessage: This shouldn't happen, and if it does then it's our fault, not yours. Try the request again shortly
